name: Cost
description: Measures the total electricity cost over a period.

name: Energy Cost Savings
description: Tracks cost reductions in energy usage compared to a previous period.

name: Energy Cost Per Unit
description: Calculates energy cost per production unit.

name: Power Consumption Efficiency
description: Assesses energy efficiency based on working time and energy consumption.

name: Power Consumption Trend
description: Measures the change in energy consumption over time.

name: Machine Utilization Rate
description: Evaluates how effectively a machine is utilized during a given period.

name: Operative Time
description: Tracks total time a machine is operative (working or idle).

name: Throughput
description: Calculates the average output produced per time unit.

name: Good Cycles
description: Counts production cycles completed without defects.

name: Bad Cycles
description: Tracks defective production cycles during a period.

name: Overall Equipment Effectiveness
description: Assesses production efficiency considering availability, performance, and quality.

name: Cycle Time
description: Measures average time to complete a production cycle.

name: Yield
description: Percentage of correctly produced output compared to total output.

name: Carbon Footprint
description: Monitors total greenhouse gas emissions for a given period.

name: Water Usage
description: Tracks water consumption during a specific period.

name: Waste Generation
description: Measures percentage of raw materials wasted during production.

name: Maintenance Cost
description: Calculates total cost of maintenance activities over time.

name: Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF)
description: Tracks average time between two equipment failures.

name: Mean Time to Repair (MTTR)
description: Measures average time to repair a machine to operational status.

name: Consumption
description: Tracks the total energy consumed by a machine during a period.
